Plot: Mirage tells the story of an African football player in a small Hungarian town, who commits a crime and has to flee. He finds refuge on a farm deep in the Hungarian flatland. Soon he ...
Title: Mirage
Writer: Szabolcs Hajdu, Nándor Lovas, Jim Stark
Actors: Isaach De Bankolé, Razvan Vasilescu, Orsolya Török-Illyés, Dragos Bucur
